isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 2000, 4000, 8000 - ELECTRONIC ENGINE, CUMMINS ISM - TROUBLESHOOTING - Cummins Electronic Service Tool

svcproc.title: Cummins Electronic Service Tool
svcproc.para: CM570 vehicles have a data link connected to the ATA date link connector (313). The Cummins electronic service tool can be connected to program owner-specified information into the engine, monitor the system, and aid in troubleshooting the engine. Consult the Cummins ISM Troubleshooting and Repair Manuals. The Cummins electronic service tool may be available at the nearest Cummins Authorized Service Center.
